reference.title: What is Square?
reference.shortdesc: Square is an eCommerce platform that is spread across multiple platforms, such as PC, mobile phone and tablet.

refbody.section:
Some tasks users can accomplish with Square include:
Take payments from customers using a "Square" reader that connects to their device
Manage an online shop
Deposit funds into a bank account
Set up gift cards

section.title: The Square Reader
section.p: The Square reader is a free mobile compatible companion that allows buyers to pay on the spot with a credit or debit card. The reader connects to most mobile devices via a 3.5mm audio jack.

image.alt: Square reader for iPhones that lack a 3.5 mm audio port

section.p: There are also options available for iPhone 7 (or later) users that utilize the Lightning charge port instead of the 3.5mm audio jack.
For an additional $29.99, a contactless card/chip reader is available that uses a Bluetooth connection.
